name: KnowNote (MrSibe)
description: [项目级] A local-first AI knowledge base & NotebookLM alternative built with Electron. More convenient, more lightweight, and understands you better!。来源: https://github.com/MrSibe/KnowNote

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A local-first AI knowledge base & NotebookLM alternative built with Electron. More convenient, more lightweight, and understands you better!

来源: https://github.com/MrSibe/KnowNote
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 923
